div.p: Every pupil has the right to receive the best all around education that his/her mental and physical makeup can absorb regardless of the social, economical, religious status or racial background of his/her family. It is the desire of our schools to furnish an environment for our pupils, which is conducive to mental, physical, and moral development. We believe that a happy, healthy student today will have a better opportunity to be a good citizen tomorrow.
